EventFeedback.disabled_not_logged_in: Please log in to give feedback
EventFeedback.explanation: Let us know how you felt about {{ eventTitle }} by leaving us a rating and maybe even a message! We'll see that it gets forwarded to the right person.
EventFeedback.message_placeholder: Do you have any more specific feedback for your host(s)? Type it here.
EventFeedback.rating_title: How much did you like this event?
EventFeedback.submit_failed: Something went wrong during submitting. Please try again . . .
EventFeedback.thank_you: Thanks for letting us know how you felt about {{ eventTitle }}.

Events.upcoming_subtitle: These events are starting in the next 30 minutes

Home.different_timezone: Your device is set to a different time zone ({{deviceTimeZone}}) than that of {{convention}} ({{conTimeZone}}).

warnings.favorites_changed_subtitle: Some of your favorites were updated since you last viewed them
warnings.no_image_caching: Your device cannot cache images. Without an internet connection, images will not be shown.
warnings.no_notifications: Your device does not support scheduled notifications. You will not receive reminders about upcoming events.
warnings.no_push_notifications: Your device does not support push notifications. You will not be automatically notified of Announcements or Private Messages.
